Posts.Content: gar wrote: My mom just told me that for the past 3 weeks, her underarm has been swollen.  It's only on one side.  She says that this has happened before. Yesterday she noticed a slight change in the shape of her breast.  She said that one of her breasts, near the bottom, had a "flat look" to it, where it has usually been round. Every where I look on the 'net, it pretty much says that this is breast cancer. I'm making her schedule an appt with her doctor ASAP.  Could it be something else?  Is this typical? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Underarm swelling & change in shape of breast gar leaf
